input.sentences: a woman was going out to meet some friends .
they went out and ordered drinks at a bar .
they also ordered some plates of nice food .
they ate and rank together and had a good time .
afterwards they wrote a check for the bill .
output.sentences: Lisa is texting the guys to see if they want to meet us for dinner and drinks.
The bar offers enticing options for everyone in our group.
We decided to move our group out to the patio.
I am always sad when these fun evenings are over and we have to pay the bill.
